## PaypalExpressUrlsInput.pending\_url property

The relative URL of the page that PayPal will redirect to when the payment has been put on hold for additional review. This condition mostly applies to ACH transactions, and is not applicable to most PayPal solutions. If the full URL to this page is https://www.example.com/paypal/action/success\_pending.html, the relative URL is paypal/action/success\_pending.html.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pending_url?: Maybe<Scalars['String']>;
```
